verbs.description: [ARG0: The White House] [V: says] [ARG1: Melania Trump is hospitalized after undergoing a procedure to treat a benign kidney condition] .
The White House says Melania Trump [V: is] hospitalized after undergoing a procedure to treat a benign kidney condition .
The White House says [ARG1: Melania Trump] is [V: hospitalized] [ARGM-TMP: after undergoing a procedure to treat a benign kidney condition] .
The White House says [ARG1: Melania Trump] is hospitalized after [V: undergoing] [ARG2: a procedure to treat a benign kidney condition] .
The White House says Melania Trump is hospitalized after undergoing [ARG3: a procedure] to [V: treat] [ARG2: a benign kidney condition] .
